CustomField.description: If checked, Event Log Files will be automatically backed up on Amazon S3 every day.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, Event Log Files will be automatically backed up on Amazon S3 every day. To change the backup frequency, you can start schedule job from Setup > Develope > Apex Classes > Schedule Apex > Class edExportEventLogFilesSchedulable.
CustomField.label: Auto Backup Event Log Files
